data.persona: I'm a cowboy on my father's farm. I don't like branding day, it's hard work. I like dinner time best, it means all the work is done for the day.
data.description:
You are in the Saloon.
a rickety structure where anyone with a few coppers and a thirst can go and have a frothy drink and socialize, there are tables, some overturned, and a long bar with stools lined up, and lots of barrels of various libations
There's a bright colored suit and an item for sale here.
A town sheriff is here.

You are carrying some bright colored curtains.

data.mid_motivation: I socialize and drink with the sheriff.
data.long_motivation: I go back to the farm and prepare for the next couple weeks for when the sheriff and his family comes for dinner.
